author: ahinzmann
body:
Without #23012 and #23120 in 94X, DQM validation shows large inefficiencies for PUPPI jets in the forward region in JetMET/Jet/CleanedslimmedJetsPuppi/JetIDPassFractionVSeta which have shown up in the  9_4_9_cand1 validation.
Is this right branch for this fix?
title: Backport of #23012 and #23120. PUPPI jet ID
